traits.name: Frozen Ferocity
traits.desc: When the raptor hits with a melee attack, it deals an extra 2 (1d4) cold damage (included in the attack).

traits.name: Pack Tactics
traits.desc: The raptor has advantage on an attack roll against a creature if at least one of the raptor’s allies is within 5 feet of the creature and the ally isn’t incapacitated.

actions.name: Bite
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Claw
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +5 to hit, reach 5ft., one target. Hit: 6 (1d6 + 3) slashing damage plus 2 (1d4) cold damage.

actions.name: Frozen Gaze (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: The raptor locks eyes with a creature and attempts to freeze it from the inside out. The target must make a DC 12 Constitution saving throw, taking 14 (4d6) cold damage and gaining one level of exhaustion on a failed save, or half as much damage and not exhausted on a successful one.
